title: Chilled Prawn Tomato and Avocado Soup
ingredients: ['1.8 litres tomato and clam juice, such as Clamato', '1.35kg cooked prawns', '4 avocados, peeled and chopped', '2 cucumbers, cubed', '3 large tomatoes, diced', '1 red onion, diced', '1 bunch coriander, chopped', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon pepper']
